scenes.description: Ina is in her studio, gushing about her friends and deciding to draw a new stage on her magical canvas.
Ina enters the summoning room and performs a ritual with her drawing.
A visual transition sequence as the new stage is being summoned.
A loading screen featuring facts about Takodachis.
Ina appears on a new starry ocean stage and begins performing 'if ~Hitori Omou~'.

subtitles.original: My heart's beating not from the running but from how cute they are honestly.
subtitles.english: My heart's beating not from the running but from how cute they are honestly.

subtitles.original: I can't believe I finally got to meet them...
subtitles.english: I can't believe I finally got to meet them...

subtitles.original: ...and at such a special day too!
subtitles.english: ...and at such a special day too!

subtitles.original: But yeah, you know, um... I think the summoning canvas, special magical canvas worked really well.
subtitles.english: But yeah, you know, um... I think the summoning canvas, special magical canvas worked really well.

subtitles.original: But, you know, what if we also drew something different...
subtitles.english: But, you know, what if we also drew something different...

subtitles.original: ...like maybe a new stage? New place?
subtitles.english: ...like maybe a new stage? New place?

subtitles.original: Do you think it'll work?
subtitles.english: Do you think it'll work?

subtitles.original: Well, we'll never know until we try, so...
subtitles.english: Well, we'll never know until we try, so...

subtitles.original: ...let's give it a try, shall we?
subtitles.english: ...let's give it a try, shall we?

subtitles.original: All right, heave-ho...
subtitles.english: All right, heave-ho...

subtitles.original: ...get my brush.
subtitles.english: ...get my brush.

subtitles.original: This might take a little longer 'cause um, I'm not very good at drawing backgrounds yet.
subtitles.english: This might take a little longer 'cause um, I'm not very good at drawing backgrounds yet.

subtitles.original: All right, oh... I hope the brush was a little smaller but...
subtitles.english: All right, oh... I hope the brush was a little smaller but...

subtitles.original: ...I think I got this. Yeah.
subtitles.english: ...I think I got this. Yeah.

subtitles.original: Okay, as detailed as possible...
subtitles.english: Okay, as detailed as possible...

subtitles.original: ...and done! Ta-da!
subtitles.english: ...and done! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: Um... can you guys guess? Guess the stage?
subtitles.english: Um... can you guys guess? Guess the stage?

subtitles.original: It's pretty good. I mean, it's the best I can do with this brush.
subtitles.english: It's pretty good. I mean, it's the best I can do with this brush.

subtitles.original: That's right, that's right. Okay, let me just put down this brush.
subtitles.english: That's right, that's right. Okay, let me just put down this brush.

subtitles.original: Ha... okay. Well, we'll see where this takes us. I don't know if it's gonna work but...
subtitles.english: Ha... okay. Well, we'll see where this takes us. I don't know if it's gonna work but...

subtitles.original: ...we'll see. All right, shall we?
subtitles.english: ...we'll see. All right, shall we?

subtitles.original: Walking over to the summoning room... [humming]
subtitles.english: Walking over to the summoning room... [humming]

subtitles.original: I... I shouldn't have...
subtitles.english: I... I shouldn't have...

subtitles.original: Okay... whew. Running up the stairs is such a work.
subtitles.english: Okay... whew. Running up the stairs is such a work.

subtitles.original: Okay...
subtitles.english: Okay...

subtitles.original: One last time.
subtitles.english: One last time.

subtitles.original: Kakikebadiru!
subtitles.english: Kakikebadiru!

subtitles.original:
TIPS
Takodachis are crafted from the void by Ina.
They have the ability to shape-shift into anything,
including daily utensils, food, and animals including humans.
Research suggests that they taste like switch cartridges when licked.
LOADING..
subtitles.english:
TIPS
Takodachis are crafted from the void by Ina.
They have the ability to shape-shift into anything,
including daily utensils, food, and animals including humans.
Research suggests that they taste like switch cartridges when licked.
LOADING..

subtitles.original:
if ～ひとり思う～
Lyrics・Composition: 株式会社インテリジェントシステムズ
subtitles.english:
if ~Hitori Omou~
Lyrics・Composition: Intelligent Systems Co., Ltd.

subtitles.original:
揺らり 揺るれり 泡沫
想い 巡る秤
subtitles.english:
Gently swaying, floating like bubbles
A scale where memories revolve

subtitles.original: 伝う...
subtitles.english: Flowing...
